Name: Under The Moon
About the game: Join Ali Kemal on his fantastic journey on the path of true love! Under the Moon is an indie adventure - riddle game. If you're a riddle enthusiast you will have lots of fun while solving riddles in game while experiencing the stylized graphics, ambient soundtracks (which are exclusive for the level that you're in) and mellow atmosphere. Features: More than 50+ riddles. (With updates it will be 100) Playable 4 Map ( Turkey, China, Russia, Egypt ) There are 2 more maps to be added with updates. ( Germany, England )
Meta Title: Under The Moon: Aug 5, 2022, Bamya Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Under The Moon? Check out the release date (Aug 5, 2022), developer insights from Bamya Games, and a complete game summary.
